name: PyMod

screenshots.caption: PyMod: Sequence similarity searches, multiple sequence-structure alignments, and homology modelling within PyMOL.
Pymol Front-end to Modeller and various other Bioinformatics Tools

short_description:
This is the UNOFFICIAL mirror to PyMod, a PyMOL plugin for "sequence similarity searches, multiple sequence-structure alignments, and homology modelling within PyMOL", as available at http://schubert.bio.uniroma1.it/pymod/index.html

It currently also hosts unofficial builds for various open source bioinformatics command line tools for 32bit and 64bit Windows, Linux and Mac, including CEalign, ClustalO (Clustal Omega), ClustalW, MUSCLE and KSDSSP.
summary: PyMOL Plugin for Homology Modeling of Protein Structures
